title: Effects of Abrasive Morphology and Surfactant Concentration on Polishing Rate of Ceria Slurry

samples.experiment_context: Slurry A (Poly-crystalline, Cerium Carbonate precursor) with 0 wt% water-soluble acrylic acid surfactant, polishing PETEOS Oxide.
